## Create some vectors in R.
### These are character string elements.
```{r}
# vectors must contain elements of the same data type ----
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")
marmots

# check the class
class(marmots)
```

### These are numeric elements.
```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 5)
pika
class(pika)
```

### These are integer elements.
```{r}
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L, 23L)
bear
class(bear)
```

## Practice addition, subtraction, multiplication, and dot product.
```{r}
# create two vectors ----
ringtail <- c(4.3, 8.9, 2.6, 7.1)
fox <- c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)

# addition ----
ringtail + fox

# subtraction ----
fox - ringtail

# scalar multiplier ----
100 * ringtail

# dot product ----
ringtail %*% fox
```
